Help Jerry through a completely ordinary looking apartment complex which has definitely not suffered from any unmentioned events, in the hopes of reaching his apartment and having his long awaited smoke break.

description: Surface Level is a narrative turn-based RPG about bugs and letting others in. You play as a small rock named Hayes on a journey of self-discovery, making friends with bugs and overcoming hardships along the way.

description: Ever wanted to run around a post-apocalyptic Japan where you, playing as a genetically re-engineered dinosaur, are the apocalypse that eliminated humanity and is now the dominant species? Heck yeah you have! Kyoryu is a third-person action-adventure where you get to do just that, picking through the literal bones of humanity while battling rival dino factions.

Featuring even more eye-popping art, nuanced animations, plus a fresh-faced cast of DT-obsessed heroines, this censored release of the Moe Game Awards-winning comedy franchise also received its own hit anime adaptation.

description: A perfect mashup of two of the most famous beat ‘em up game franchises - Streets of Rage and Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles!

description: Spikeball is a sports video game that adapts the classic game of Spikeball to the digital environment. Designed to offer a fast and competitive gaming experience, it allows you to face players from all over the world or enjoy games with friends.

description: Byte Breakers is a platform fighting battle royale for 40 players. Navigate a massive city, gear up, and escape the encroaching glitch zone while battling the world to become the last duo standing.

name: Solace Creek
description: Solace Creek is a Horror game with a focus on suspense, exploration, stealth & puzzle solving. You wake up in a sinister place, haunted by a monstrous presence. Uncover the mystery of this dark place... or become its prey.

name: Light-Years Away
description: Light Years Away is an epic sci-fi ARPG survival game that plunges you into the vast, uncharted depths of space. As a stranded starship captain, you must navigate through mysterious galaxies, gather resources, and recruit a unique crew to help you on your journey home. The game combines elements of top-down shooter action, resource management, and exploration, creating a rich and immersive experience.

name: Atelier Iris: Eternal Mana 2 After Episode
description: Atelier Iris: Eternal Mana 2 After Episode is an Atelier side game taking place after the ending of Atelier Iris 2: The Azoth of Destiny.

description:
A remake of Pinball Mania which updates the 2D original tables into 3D.

The tables are:
- Daredevil
- Kick-off
- Jackpot
- Jailbreak
- Tarantula

name: I Remember This Dream
description: "I Remember This Dream" is a first-person survival horror game which takes place in a cold winter forest where there is only you and your fear hiding in the shadows of the trees.

name: StellwerkSim
description: StellwerkSim is a simulator game about german signalling. Its based of the german Sp DR S 60 signal system. Its singleplayer (training mode) or multiplayer.

name: Project Shaman
description: Project Shaman is a demo about Turkic Mythology. You play as Kam, a shaman that needs to reach Tamag (Hell) and fight Erlik, the god of the dead. In this demo you are stopped by one of Erlik's 3 daughters, Kiştey Ana. You must defeat Kiştey Ana to get deeper into Tamag.

name: Plant Mall
description: This game is a small maze explorer where you will plant flowers and meet new faces along the way.

name: The Nightscarred: Forgotten Gods
description: Embrace your destiny as the daughter of Erlik, the god of death, in this immersive first-person action game. Craft your own spells, creatively combine them with Nightscarred's hybrid combat system, and assassinate your foes to restore balance in a physics-driven shamanic world based on Turkic mythology. Play alone or team up with a friend in co-op mode.

name: Fat Frumos
description: ZX Spectrum adventure game based on the Romanian folk hero Fat Frumos.

name: NandGame
description: An educational puzzle game. Solve a series of tasks where you build increasingly powerful components.

name: Lab
description: Explore and escape a mutant infested lab. Collect weapons, health and armor upgrades and fight and try to survive the onslaught!

name: Storm Cleaner
description:
Action Cozy meet Hidden Object games.

You are a Storm Cleaner. After a storm left an island, you will visit them and organize everythings to their original position.

name: Traveling Union
description: A 2.5D RPG in pre-alpha public access. Built using the Bakin Engine.

name: SM64 GBA
description:
SM64 GBA is a non-profit fan project which aims to make a port of Super Mario 64 (along with new features, like new characters) for the Game Boy Advance. The project was started as a means of testing and improving how 3D games can be developed for the Game Boy Advance architecture, a capability that only a few commercial games made use of.

The game is still in development, but isn't currently intended to be released officially by the creator.

name: FF4: Free Enterprise
description: Sin descripción

name: Super Mario Bros. Dimensions
description: Sin descripción

name: Super Mario Defense
description: Sin descripción

name: Habromania
description: HABROMANIA is an offbeat, unsettlingly charming, narrative rich point-and-click game inspired by Alice in Wonderland. It follows 19-year-old, well-mannered Alice as she tumbles headfirst into Wonderland. With no memory of her past and no real allies except an enigmatic, grinning cat, Alice must outwit, outmatch, and maybe even befriend the mildly psychotic people and creatures she encounters as she tries to return to her world - with or without going mad herself.

name: Pokémon Existence
description:
Original Pokémon (only a few families) ranging from Gen 1 to Gen 9. (For now, there is access to 40 families within the fangame).
In total, the game features over 200 Pokémon species, most of them being original to the game, native species.
It features the Mega Evolution mechanics, although the concept has been readapted and is based on the “Divinization” of the species, which are orbs that react to the Vital Particle.
Creation of many new moves with very diverse effects, in addition to a large number of moves per tutor, which gives more variety of attacks to the game.
Within the Gyms, there will be 1 employee who will be able to teach useful moves to the protagonist, beyond those already found as normal with the passage of the adventure.
It does not have mechanics such as Dynamax or Z-Moves, since it does not make much sense for the development of our story. However, apart from the forms by Divinization, there are also several form changes between species, fusions and use of armor (without the need for a final evolutionary phase).
There are several regional forms of existing Pokémon (examples would be Slugma and Sableye).
Improved the probability of finding shiny Pokémon.

name: Pokémon Evol
description: Choose your partner and begin your Pokémon adventure in the Dalaris region. Crime has increased and someone close to you has been splashed. Does this mean that an old Team Villain is about to return?

name: Pokémon Hero
description:
Original Story: Forget about gym leaders and embark on a whole new adventure.
Unique cast: Meet colorful characters with varied personalities and ideals.
Heroism: Each character will see you as a hero or villain in their story depending on your actions.
Pokémon of all generations available.
Challenge to your measure: 3 levels of difficulty and the enemies adapt to the level of your Pokémon.
Bosses both obligatory and optional.
Scripted Battles: Adding strategy and narrative to the encounters.
Hidden Zones: Discover Zorua's illusions, revealing treasures and mysteries.
Missions and Achievements.
Extensive and detailed map that you will be able to travel with Ultraflight.
Battle interface that allows you to see all the information in combat.
Challenges and Riddles that will test your strength and intelligence.
Many more mechanics such as Pokémon following you, see the Pokémon available on each route, Mugshots, etc..

name: Pokémon Conquerors
description: The Ransei Region is divided into kingdoms for each elemental type, and these are at constant war. Nobunaga the Warlord of the dragon kingdom of the North has the ambition to conquer all Ransei to destroy it, and you, the protagonist Warlord of Aurora must find a way to stop him by forming your army.

name: Pokémon Z
description: Discover what happened in the Kalos region 300 years ago.

name: Pokémon Panteón
description: In an ancient region called Olympia, our protagonist embarks on an incredible odyssey proposed by the philosopher professor Palmiro. Defeat the leaders of the different Agoras of the region and solve their mysteries. Confront the students of the Platena Academy and meet your eternal rivals, Lira and Aulus.

name: Pokémon Pro
description:
Developed with Pokémon PSDK for RPG Maker XP, you will enter a new region called Zealon. With your pokémon team and your friends, you will face challenges in which your skills as a trainer will be tested. Get ready for an adventure where the darkness can catch you. But remember: Stars only shine when the sky is dark.

In the past, the Zealon region was inhabited by humans. The pokémon were predominant throughout the region, until one day it was discovered by humans. This caused a great conflict in being conquered by the great powers of that time, causing great wars for the territories of the region.

Not all humans had the same greed to obtain the territory of others. One trainer wanted harmony in the region.
This same trainer created an alliance of a few trainers to help end the wars that the region was suffering, after seeing that the great powers did not want to reach a pact. But even so, the alliance was not enough to stop the wars.

Pharaoh, legendary Pokémon and considered sovereign of life. He had been observing the wars caused by greed for decades. He came to the conclusion that these wars were caused by the conflicts of the humans themselves.
The balance of life among the pokémon was breaking down and Pharaoh ordered Kenaice and Spiwolf, pokémon guardians of the balance between life and death, to stop these wars.

Kenaice and Spiwolf appeared in the battle. Thanks to their power they were able to put an end to the wars, and helped those trainers and pokémon who wanted harmony by giving them some of their energy to recover.

That trainer and his companions, managed that several cultures lived in harmony for many years and thanks to those legendary pokémon the balance between life and death was restored.

Nowadays, during your adventure in exploring the region and overcoming the challenges that await you, you will be involved in the chaotic history that can happen again in the Zealon region.

name: Picture Perfect
description: Find the perfect shot in this cozy puzzle game about forced perspective.

name: Pokémon Berilo
description:
In your region, there's no training for Pokémon trainers, and thanks to Professor Rosa, an acquaintance of your parents, you get a ticket to Nubia. There you get your first Pokémon and can challenge the eight Leaders of the region to challenge the Champion. In your path will cross a completely untraditional Villain Team, what will they want? What will be their role in your adventure? They are up to something and you can be sure it won't be good.

Traversing Nubia will be no easy task, full of story elements, quests, ruins, hidden treasures and colorful NPCs that will help you in your adventure (or not). If you are a person who enjoys exploring everything and looking for the hidden secrets of the game, you will find that the game is not easy.

name: Pokémon Sombras de Arceus
description:
Pokémon Shadows of Arceus is a deconstruction of the traditional Pokémon story, giving it a more strategic touch and offering a real challenge for Pokémon lovers.

The story focuses on exploration, getting all the necessary resources to continue the adventure and is open, you can do it in the order you want.

There will be training facilities to be able to create different combat strategies.

Create your ultimate multicolored team thanks to the random shiny wells!

The story originates in the region of Heria, where a group of scientists manage to develop a whole industry around Pokémon battles.
Their mission is to train Pokémon for competition and sell them to trainers to gain popularity in battles and funding for their projects.
They use the same cloning method they used with Mewtwo. Thanks to him, they started to awaken and capture legendaries to make Pokémon battling a much bigger spectacle.
But something terrible happened when they awakened Arceus and the world as we know it was almost destroyed to ashes.

The story is set 10 years after this event and shows us a post-apocalyptic world, plagued by very strong wild Pokémon and evildoers lurking around every corner.
After suffering an attack, our protagonist receives his first Pokémon and once he overcomes the first challenge of getting his first medal, the destiny that has been waiting for him for so long, finally appears.

name: Pokémon Abismal
description:
A thousand years ago, a meteorite hit the Kingdom of Celestia. From its interior, an evil being emerged that tried to plunge the world into darkness, but after a bloody war, that being was banished to another dimension... Until now, because it is said that the seal that held him captive has been destroyed.

Live a unique adventure to unravel the mysteries surrounding the Kingdom of Celestia. A radical climate change, the appearance of the mysterious Astral Pokémon and the existence of a sect that worships the Dark Star are just some of the many threats to the peace of the kingdom.

Will you be able to save Celestia from its end or will you be a mere witness to its destruction?

name: Pokémon Consonancia
description: Pokémon Consonance, inspired by Pokémon Masters, is a game in which you will travel to Passio as a novice trainer, there you will meet different characters from all the official releases together, from Kanto to Paldea, as well as characters brought by the Masters, such as Professor Margarita, You will participate in the WPM, a high level tournament that seeks to determine the strongest trainer of all, to achieve this task, you must improve as a trainer, but also, you must recruit different characters for your team, some of them will do it by history but many of them will depend on a RNG factor: The gachapon mode. It won't be easy to be the best, so testing strategies and team combinations will be fundamental!

name: Pokemon Tactics
description:
From a region where Pokémon are feared, you accompany Professor Ceibo, a researcher isolated from society. To the region of Xicadia, a place where humans and Pokémon live in peace, fighting hand in hand... and with each other.
The objective: To investigate on an evolutionary method, which manifests itself with the bonds of humans and Pokémon, an evolutionary method for humans.
For that Professor Ceibo together with 3.... well 4 mercenaries to help you. Brigham, a bard with a face of few friends accompanied by his Chimchar, Lily's older brother. Lily, a girl who supports her cowardly Chikorita from a distance. Murchadh, a berserker with a good heart but who doesn't talk much about his past, accompanied by a friendly Mudkip. Finally Valentina, a thunder mage accompanied by a rather lazy Shinx.

name: Pokemon RE:Call
description: After becoming a Pokémon Trainer, you come back to Knot Island to reconnect with an old friend, Bill. As the good friend you are, you decide to help Bill with his mission, encountering many problems with the evil Team Rocket. Their boss, Giovanni, has hidden agendas with Pokémon, especially the unique Paradox Pokémon, which have energy from the past and future.

description: Cinnabar Nights is a first-person rpg with turn-based combat. Explore diverse landscapes, unearth powerful equipment, manage your resources, and harness otherworldly powers.

name: Squirreled Away
description: Be the squirrel. Scurry through gardens, up trees, and leap limb to limb in this craft and thrive park life adventure. Explore solo or with up to three squirrel buddies in co-op. Meet and help other residents and collect bits here and there to build and decorate your dream treehouse.

name: Teletubes: Electronic Pet
description:
The infamous Tamagotchi - Teletubbies 3 in 1 is here again!!!

The children's Tamagotchi - Teletubbies 3 in 1 is a small console with an electronic animal that must be watched to grow up. The little electronic animal needs your personal care and attention to stay alive and grow.

name: Trickster Trove
description: Feel the fear and adrenaline in the deadly dungeons in search of treasures. Create impenetrable catacombs, protecting loot from other players. Test your skills and strategies in a world where every decision can be your last. One life - one chance!

name: Hidalgo
description: Embark on the most iconic and cozy adventures from the classic novel "Don Quixote of La Mancha". In a handcrafted, colorful puppet world, you'll battle windmills, be knighted, will solve puzzles with Don Quijote and Sancho and fight for the love of your beloved Dulcinea.

name: Reignbreaker
description: Lockpicks meet spiked iron gauntlets in this 'medievalpunk' single-player action-roguelike. Fight through hordes of lock-operated mechs and free the world from the corrupt elite. Plunder their coffers, smash the kingdom and become The Reignbreaker.

description: Sega vs. Capcom: The Next Level is a fan game made by Madxruler that crosses over the two major franchises, resembling the combat style of Tatsunoko vs. Capcom.

name: Ghost Frequency
description:
Experience an episodic third-person psychological horror game that delves into the dark and sinister corners of abandoned haunted places. You are going to play as Maya, an urban explorer rookie on an adventure to uncover the hidden truth and gain fame on the streaming platform. Navigate through claustrophobic alleyways, uncovers new clues and whispers of rumors, revealing a web of mysteries and reveal the hidden truth.

Are you bold enough to confront the shadows and uncover the reality lurking beneath?

name: Pokémon Blessed Shield
description: Sin descripción

name: The Cope
description: The Cope is a 2D, point-and-click game that presents the fear of the unknown. Your night shift client service job as a janitor will start with you getting entangled in a series of strange stories in The Cope mansion. Work cleaning and serving your client and find the truth of this mansion of fear.

name: Heroes of Might & Magic: Olden Era
description: Heroes of Might & Magic: Olden Era is the official prequel hailing back to the origins of the genre-defining, critically acclaimed series of turn-based strategy games. Explore the map solo or in multiplayer, triumph in iconic battles and establish peace on a continent where it was never an option.

name: Block Factory
description: Block Factory is a production and automation game focusing on creating 3D figurines from building blocks in a factory. Shape your models, design and optimize your assembly lines to bring your creations to life!

name: Cursebane
description: Cursebane is a fast-paced, stylish katana-action roguelite. Step into the forest of fate, where your choices twist your journey. Empower your sword and spells as you seek out those doomed by prophecy and save them from the Curse.

name: Weird O's: Chaos Royale
description: Dive, dodge, and dash your way to victory in the wildest fantasy brawl! Weird O's: Chaos Royale is a 3D platforming battle royale like no other, blending hilarious co-op exploration with chaotic free-for-alls. Team up to gather crystals, unleash your animal spirit and conquer wacky obstacle courses.

name: Una noche sin nombre
description: This is a world where witches and demons dwell on the fringes of reality. Charles finds himself in the rain, seeking shelter when he encounters a woman in the forest who asks him for a favor—to search for something very precious to her. At that moment, Charles finds a house and ventures inside, where he encounters a mysterious girl.

name: Mario Racing Tournament
description: Join Mario, his friends, and also his enemies, in the Mario Racing Tournament game. Participate at the biggest racing tournament in the Mushroom Kingdom!

name: Lysium: Stardiver
description: In the distant rings of the planet Alphios, rookie mechanic Samantha Krain takes her first careful steps into the field as an official member of a crew of misfit space salvagers. When a huge salvage mission turns up on the surface of the planet, however, the race is on as opportunity calls to be the first one to reach a trove of technology. Is it fortune smiling upon the intrepid explorers, or is treachery leering from the shadows...?

name: JimsDay
description:
A multiplayer VR game where you can hangout with your friends or random players.
Or you can play a different singleplayer gamemode like sandbox where you can mess around with different objects you can spawn in.

name: Rhythm Heaven Megamix: Sonic 2 Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Luggage Lane
description: Luggage Lane is an action-packed game where you take on the role of a check-in agent named Lane who has to work a shift alone. Your goal is to process luggage as fast as you can on 3 check-in desks.

name: Slimey Climbey Chambers
description:
Help Sobay the Slime get out of this strange tile maze! Use goop to propel yourself to new heights, and gain new forms and abilities by collecting the mega slime essence!

Made for the GMTK 2024 Jam in 96 hours, for the theme "Built to Scale!"

name: Hexahedral
description: Hexahedral is a cuboid, challeging, 3D platformer, physics based, puzzle game with specific mechanics and surreal atmosphere, where you need to understand how your movement works and use your abilities to your favor to reach as high as you can. This game is intentionally difficult and confusing at some points, though the mechanics are pretty simple, once you learn how to move propperly, you will notice it isn't enough for you to overcome it, you must as well have patience and be persistent, then you may be able to reach the end. This journey depends completly on you, so don't give up, and remember, it can always get worse.

name: Hela
description: Become a brave mouse familiar in a heartwarming 3D adventure through stunning Scandinavian landscapes. Solve puzzles, explore, and brew magic potions to find a cure for your befriended Witch. Experience a healing journey like no other!

name: Hoomanz!
description: A Planet in Peril - Embrace the darkness, save Erf! Step into the paws of Shoo, a mysterious, mythical creature with a hidden dual nature, in this charming casual adventure game. You're tasked with a mission: rid planet Erf of the ignorant Hoomanz invaders!

name: SubwaySim 2
description:
Dive into Simuverse Interactive's new public transport simulation!
SubwaySim 2 allows you to explore not only the underground network of Hamburg but now also that of the German capital Berlin! Face various unique scenarios and transport your passengers safely and punctually from station to station.

name: Warriors of Nova Thera
description: Warriors of Nova Thera is a roguelike action-adventure where you play as Pixelmons! Explore and battle your way through the different biomes and discover exciting encounters. Collect shardstones from your expeditions out into the wild and use them back in the game hub to unlock upgrades and become stronger.

name: Lost Ember: Remastered
description:
The remastered edition of the acclaimed adventure features 4k, HDR, and overall improved graphics powered by Unreal Engine 5. Apart from the visual improvements, it includes a brand-new Free Roam mode with a new open world spreading over several biomes that includes all playable animals and new mini-challenges!

Owners of the original game will be able to upgrade for a small upgrade fee!

A breathtakingly beautiful world holds the secrets of its past for you and your companion to uncover in this 5-hour journey.

name: Doom: The Golden Souls 3
description: Explore giant colorful worlds while completing quests to obtain Golden Souls! You can fully explore the maps at your own pace, and even experience completed missions again!

name: Huaxia: Warring States
description: Build your own epic story in the Huaxia: Warring States. Start a clan, conquer the lands, and build an empire. Or roam the Nine Provinces as a lone warrior fighting bandits and monsters. The choice is yours!

name: Coin
description: Invest in ChadCoin by simply clicking! In ChadCoin, you click the Coin to gain even more Coins! Get a random coin every time you click enough and grow your collection!

name: Section 13
description: Sin descripción

name: God Save Birmingham
description: Doom has come to Birmingham, and you are the last soul alive. Survive an undead plague in a painstakingly recreated medieval market town. Manage your needs, master physics-based mechanics, and evade the horde for as long as you can.

name: Nightmare House: Reimagined
description: No sleeping beyond this point. Slash through nightmares, twist reality, and uncover the hidden secrets of Nightmare House.

name: Echoes of Mystralia
description: Mages of Mystralia's award-winning spellcrafting system enters a new era. Free Mystralia from the Shadows of the Past in this action-RPG roguelite. Create an infinite variety of spells to save the Memory of the World.

name: Maui The Shapeshifter
description: Play as Maui the demigod in an adventure to save his island home from a darkness that threatens to consume it. Transform into majestic animals, meet spirit Aumakua, explore unique biomes, face epic bosses, and defeat nefarious enemies in this epic hand-painted 2D open world Metroidvania.

name: Dfuse
description: FPS meets MOBA in DFUSE’s adrenaline-fueled mashup. Wield realistic military tools and outsmart your rivals in quick-fire matches that blend strategic depth with adrenaline-pumping action. Plant the bomb, secure the defusal, or dominate the battlefield.

name: Croak
description: Croak is a nimble -and challenging- precision platformer featuring an innovative grapple mechanic. Use the prince’s tongue to dash and bounce around through hundreds of hand-crafted rooms. Manipulate the environment as you traverse distinct biomes, each with unique gameplay mechanics and bosses.

name: Mars Attracts
description: Mars Attracts is a park management sim set in the iconic universe of Mars Attacks. Build rides, hire staff, manage guest needs, and abduct humans to serve as the star attractions. You'll face demanding visitors, environmental hazards, and the ever-looming threat of human escapes!

name: Adventure In XX City 2: Finding BB
description: Sin descripción

name: Gnome Escape
description: A masterful survival game inspired by the likes of such classics Snake, developed by cocoyroach entertaiment, Gnome Escape is just a start of something bigger.

name: Command & Conquer: Legions - Season Red Alert
description: Sin descripción

name: Warhammer: Vermintide 2 - Versus
description: Sin descripción

name: The Games You Make
description: “Quit your job, take out a loan and make a top seller game” sounded like a great idea two months ago. Now, you’re chasing bizarre bugs, combining features that should never go together, and striving to capture that mysterious thing called “fun”. Every decision is yours—and so are the consequences.

name: Let's Build a Dungeon
description: Manage a game studio making the world’s greatest MMORPG. Hire designers, coders, and testers, create a fantasy world, then welcome hundreds of virtual players. If they get bored they will cancel their subscription and your investors will have your head. You can even play the game you create.

name: Stalker 2
description: Continuation of the famous role-playing game Stalker. 30 years have passed and our hero is back again... Back to fight, not to retreat, to win! RPG fans will be pleased. The mobile game Stalker 2 offers them an entertaining plot, nice graphics. Control is possible both 4-button and 8-button, which will simplify the character's movements. Flexible settings of the mobile game are pleasing. Even the appearance of blood, the flight of bullets, shadows and the flow of water are adjustable.

name: Memory of Souls
description: Immerse yourself in the spellbinding world of Memory of Souls, a captivating visual novel where love and adventure come together. Choose your moments, explore a world...

name: Stalker: The Way of Survival
description: A game with RPG elements and the melancholy beauty of a world that has survived a nuclear disaster. It has everything: a hero without memory, residents without help, enemies without punishment. Your task is to restore order, both in the outside world and in yourself. The main values ​​are eternal values: food, weapons, medicines... You are a stern character, not particularly talkative and purposeful. Have you woken up? Follow me! The village elder with the gentle name Anna will give you your first task.

name: MindFall
description: This is a game about Rubik's cube! Here you have to control the cube and get to the end, but everything is not so simple. If the cube turns over on one of the sides, its control will change, and it will not be so easy to pass!

name: Train Sim World VR: New York
description: Get ready for Train Sim World VR: New York! Grab the controls of modern trains and explore the MTA Harlem Line between Grand Central Terminal and North White Plains.

name: Eldritch Empathy
description: Learn the language of a cosmic colossus in the Lovecraftian rogue-lite Eldritch Empathy. Study eerie horrors to learn their secrets, or destroy them and face the consequences. Your choices determine the fate of humanity.

name: Tiny Chao Garden
description:
The Tiny Chao Garden (チャオのプチガーデン or Chao no Petit Garden) is a mini game available in Sonic Advance, Sonic Advance 2, Sonic Pinball Party, and downloadable to a Game Boy Advance via Sonic Adventure 2: Battle, Sonic Adventure DX: Director's Cut, and Phantasy Star Online Episode I & II (GameCube version). The 2 Games in 1: Sonic Advance & Sonic Pinball Party compilation contains a separate Tiny Chao Garden for each game.

Like the Chao Adventure mini-game on consoles, Tiny Chao Garden allows the player to take their Chao with them and raise it on their Game Boy Advance. The Chao does not age like it does in Sonic Adventure, so the player has plenty of time to raise all of its stats to level 99.

name: Project GW
description: Sin descripción

name: Pipelurker
description:
Inspired by Abe's odyssey, Prince of persia and other classic of the genre, Pipelurker is a stealth platforming game where a prolonged contact with light will kill your character. Thread carefully, avoid direct confrontation and reclaim your treasure.

Made in 5 days for the first 1 Bit Jam.

name: Lackgirl II: De Docta Ignorantia
description: Sequel of the visual novel『Lackgirl I: Astra Inclinant, sed Non Obligant.』, teased after the ending credits.

name: Super Luigi Trick or Treat
description: Sin descripción

name: Masters of Albion
description: Build by day, fight by night in an epic story of power and consequence. Design, build and customise your world, from the food your people eat to the clothes they wear, the weapons they wield to the homes they live in. Possess characters at will in this unique God Game – Masters of Albion!

name: Impostors
description:
Experience a NEW ERA of social deduction gaming! Outsmart your opponents, form unlikely alliances, trick & deceive to stay alive! Work together to complete tasks but watch out for the impostors! They're lurking in the shadows, ready to sabotage your efforts and kill you off one by one…
Enjoy countless game scenarios with your friends in this 4-15 player party-game, talk your way out of trouble with in-game voice chat, and immerse yourself in an ever-changing world with surprises around every corner!

name: Reanimal
description: The creators of Little Nightmares I & II have returned to take you on a darker, more terrifying journey than ever before. In this horror adventure game, a brother & sister go through hell to rescue their missing friends and escape the island that they used to call home.

name: King of Meat
description: Are you hell-bent on destruction? Or a creator-of-chaos? The most-watched, sometimes controversial but always talked-about survival game show, KING OF MEAT, is waiting for Contenders, Builders and Creatives. Jump in and battle for gold and glory together with friends and fellow Contenders.

name: We Harvest Shadows
description: A first-person farming horror allegory. Become a recluse, build up your farm, and survive the lonely nights.

name: Air Royale
description: Air Royale is an exhilarating multiplayer game designed for virtual reality. Step into a high-flying, action-packed world where players have fun playing multiple minigames. Engage and have fun in Air Royale!

name: Miku'n Pop
description: This game is stylized like an action platformer game from 80's - 90's. Your objective is to defeat all enemies on the screen. Each character has their own different play styles. Featuring 2 difficulty modes; Hard Mode & Easy Mode. There are 9 stages, & for each 10 levels, you will encounter a boss.

name: Fantasy Legion
description: A fantasy puzzle strategy game with a mass battler battle arena theme where players seek glories and riches fighting against other armies.

name: Philatelist
description:
A journey through time in the world of Philately
Philatelist is an indie jigsaw puzzle game inspired by philately.

name: QuickBite Express
description: QuickBite Express is an ultra-dynamic platformer about the challenges of courier work. Deliver orders on time and undamaged across multiple cities to maintain your rating.

name: Oggy and the Cockroaches
description: Based on the animated series OGGY that first appeared in 1999, OGGY AND THE COCKROACHES presents some role reversal with Oggy as the victim fighting off three pesky cockroaches.

name: Alice in Vivaldi's Four Seasons
description: Alice walks into a magical Music Clock dropped by the White Rabbit. But the clock is broken, and Alice is trapped inside!

name: Face Off: A Hot Shot Story
description: Hot Shot, Book 2 is the second book of the Hot Shot series. It succeeds its first book, Hot Shot, Book 1.

description: Most Wanted, Book 2 is the second book of the Most Wanted series. It succeeds its first book, Most Wanted, Book 1. This book has now been canceled as of 2021.

description: In a small town, you started working as a security guard and decided to check the data recordings from security cameras for fun. But you didn't know you would discover the tales of lascivious alleys...

description: Hero, Vol. 2 was to be the second book of the Hero series. It succeeds its first book, Hero, Vol. 1. This book has now been canceled as of 2021.

Engage in intense 4v4 matches where victory is achieved through overwhelming force or strategic objective control. Your hero's power grows as the battle progresses, culminating in epic clashes against both players and formidable bosses.

name: Loneliness Butterfly
description:
Loneliness Butterfly marks the thrilling conclusion of Arachne's Anthology trilogy.

Picking up right after the events of Realm of Lament, this installment introduces Eddy Ruina, Feedra's wife and a lieutenant in Measuryville. Alerted by Penelope's email regarding Thomas's disappearance, Eddy joins the search. Their investigation leads them back to the events of Carnival, where they uncover the existence of the Soul Realm Gate, a potential path to Thomas. But is it truly that simple?

name: Twilight Horizon
description: Sin descripción

name: Ballet Parking
description: Bump into cars and make them spin like ballistic ballerinas until they reach the parking spot that matches their color. Make sure you use the right strategy: both the time and the number of hits are limited!

name: NightStars: Project 1
description: Sin descripción

name: 77Survival
description: 77Survival is a survival game set in a post-apocalyptic world. Players will control four characters who accidentally find themselves stranded on the rooftop of a 77-story building. Their mission is to survive as long as possible or venture down to the first floor to uncover the mysterious events happening in the building. Each character has unique abilities, allowing them to solve puzzles and complete missions. If all four characters die, the game is over.

name: Farewell, My Dearest Love
description: What if the only room for an overnight stay is haunted by supernatural stories? Can you survive until morning?

name: Luciel Angel Mission
description: This is the story of the apprentice angel 'Luciel' who loves to study about the world. Once upon a time, all 3 worlds were ruled by God. after the war between The angels are led by 'Lucifer' the anti-God. Defeated and expelled, but then one day he disappeared, no one knew where he was. and gave the mission to Luciel for some reason.

name: Pearl Rising
description:
You play as Pearl, a young cadet, woken up when your city is under attack by the Bugs. Your job is to secure the area and find out what's going on!
The only good bug is a dead bug, they say.

name: Aria and The Ancient Artifacts
description: Sin descripción

name: Connect
description: Connect is an RPG inspired by Mother 2: A story about unexpected phenomena that occur in the world. Billy, the person affected by this matter, must set out to find the truth of the phenomenon. So he found out that....what had happened was so surreal.

name: IguaRPG 2
description: This is another fangame of Oddwarg Animal RPG, a Game Maker game from 2003.

name: Hose Hero
description: A Top-down shooter where you Jet water kids to keep them at bay and Hose them Down for trying to fight your little brother! Shoot water balloons and collect upgrade cards throughout runs and occasionally fight bosses !

name: Naddagil: A Nordic Nightmare
description: Enter the mythical world of Naddagil: A Nordic Nightmare. In this cozy-horror game you have to guide a little child back home. But be aware, that not all creatures in this world will try to help you. Your only chance of survival is to hide and avoid the mysterious Naddagil lurking for you.

name: 7 Days
description:
Step into a world where dreams and reality mix.
Play as a boy trapped between waking life and a dream, exploring his memories each day. Each day reveals a new part of his life, from school and family to love and loss. Your choices will determine if he finds hope and wakes up or falls into darkness. Experience unique environments, calming music, and an emotional story in this immersive adventure.

name: Tailgate
description: Hyde, an aging labrador retriever, wakes up and realizes that Derek, his beloved Human has disappeared. The doggo reluctantly leaves the house to investigate, only to find himself in the middle of an ancient dog prophecy.

name: Factorio: Space Exploration
description:
Space Exploration is an overhaul mod for Factorio that continues player's journey after launching the rocket. Expand your factory into space and manage interplanetary logistics. Travel around the solar system in buildable ships and reach light speed to beat the game.

The Space Exploration mod predates the Space Age DLC and both are being developed by the same individual, so they will have similar elements. Space Exploration is meant for players looking for a lengthy, expert challenge.

name: Dragon Quest Fushigi no Dungeon MOBILE
description: It is a mobile phone app game, and versions were distributed for i-mode, EZweb, and Yahoo! Mobile. Like Dragon Quest: Young Yangus to Fushigi no Dungeon, the protagonist is Yangus as a young boy, but the content is completely different.

name: Schismo's Sideshow
description:
A hand-drawn action roguelike set inside of a strange circus attraction.

Defeat hordes of fast-moving enemies to generate energy for the circus. Collect Schismo's lost Stamps to change your playstyle and raise the skill ceiling. Meta-progression comes in the form of Marlbes that offer mutually exclusive choices.

name: Ventreville: A Cure for Sorrow
description: Determine the fate of Ventreville, a city plagued by sickness and secrets. Play as six protagonists with unique abilities as you interrogate and outwit suspects, hide from enemies, crack puzzles, and even call the Gods for help! What are you willing to risk to find the truth?

name: Jazz Dungeon
description: Sin descripción

name: Oh So Hero!
description: Oh So Hero! is a lewd metroidvania game in development by Full Frontal Frog! Play as the dragonesque hero Joe to fight and fornicate with enemies, build intimate relationships with anthropomorphic characters, and embark on a sex-filled adventure to win the mysterious alien Gerrabacco tournament being held on Joe's island!

name: Helward: A Tanuki Story
description:
Helward is a gay furry romance VN about a fish out of water tanuki named Howl. After a year of an intimate long-distance relationship, he will finally pursue his romantic interest.

Given his propensity for misfortune, many mishaps await Howl in his efforts for love. On top of that, in the territory of Helward secrets and dangers abound. He'll have much to overcome while also juggling secrets of his own.

name: CrisisX
description: Sin descripción

name: Spirits of Baciu
description: SPIRITS OF BACIU is the enigmatic adventure of The Lost One, a mysterious cat-like spirit who suddenly awakens in the dark Baciu forest. Help him to find his way through the woods, solving puzzles and facing the spirits that inhabit this strange place.

name: Skyless Blind
description: Skyless Blind is an upcoming surreal space exploration RPGmaker game about uncovering the mysteries of a broken universe. Travel across beautifully ancient worlds and meet strange new friends, collect mystifying artifacts that bend reality, and discover the dark secrets that shattered the skies.

name: Pavu
description: Pavu is an action adventure game where we are going to follow a young boy's quest in search of answers about himself and humanity in a fantastical land filled with robots, challenges and encounters that was once habited by a human civilization that has vanished.

name: Scriptorium: Master of Manuscripts
description: Run your manuscript workshop, receive orders to illustrate medieval books, decorate them any way you like, send them back to clients to get paid, and unlock new jobs, decorations, and items. Welcome to your very own medieval scriptorium!

name: Cat Cafe Manager 2: Big City Bliss
description: In this cozy management lifesim, care for cute cats & customers while exploring a bustling folkloric city. Build the cat cafe of your dreams and fill hearts with delight using the power of cats, coffee and community

name: Instants
description: A heartwarming journey through time. Use your wits and creativity to lovingly craft photo albums and piece together the story of one family throughout the generations.

name: Wasteland: Waste Disposal
description: Recycle The Apocalyptic Wasteland, with a moving waste disposal plant. Craft, Refine, Survive. Restore the environment to a balanced ecosystem and recruit help by finding survivors.

name: Super Loco World
description: Build railroads and deliver goods in a dynamic world. Carefully use rail signs to avoid traffic jams, achieve peak efficiency (if you want to), and watch villages grow into towns.

name: Defect
description: DEFECT is a cyberpunk, squad-based, Immersive Shooter set in a dystopian world, where AI controls the city with fearsome police forces. They battle rogue gang factions in intense 4x4x4x4, multi-objective, multi-finale face-offs featuring futuristic weapons & tech.

name: Sightings from the Deep
description: Sightings from the Deep is an "On-Rails Photography game", inspired heavily by games such as Pokémon Snap, but set in a dying, Bloodborne-esque, horror setting.

name: Undertale Wildfire
description: Undertale Wildfire is a fan-made prequel to Toby Fox’s Undertale, centered around the second fallen human: the soul of bravery.

description: Medal Network Rockman.EXE (メダルネットワークロックマンエグゼ) is a medal game from the Rockman.EXE series released by Banpresto in 2002 in Japan.

description: Introducing "Hallways," a multiplayer escape game. Navigate corridors, evade pursuers, and compete with friends or globally. Solo, 2-player, and 4-player modes, with a matchmaking system and private lobbies. Customize characters and gear, employ strategy, and conquer challenging levels in this game.

name: Silver Pines
description: Silver Pines is a survival horror metroidvania. Fight nightmarish terrors and solve puzzles, while carefully managing your scarce resources as you uncover the mysteries of a case that could hold the key to redemption.

name: Calamity
description:
Welcome to Calamity, a free-to-play action-RPG set in a vibrant 2D top-down world.
Inspired by legendary games such as World of Warcraft, Lineage, Diablo, and Albion Online, Calamity offers a rich and engaging experience where you can conquer challenging dungeons or battle against other players.

name: Meta Battler
description:
Meta Battler is a rogue like deck building game which utilises every NFT built on the Wax blockchain.
Meta Battler is free to play - battle through increasingly difficult towers to become the ultimate champion, power up your cards and decks and win unique collectible prizes along the way!

name: The Knightling
description: The Knightling is a platforming action adventure where you play as an aspiring knight in search of their missing mentor, Sir Lionstone. Equipped with only a legendary shield, you’ll brave your way through the lands of Clesseia to become the unlikely hero.

name: Animal Basket
description:
Animal Basket 2005 Sammy Corp.

Export release. Game developed in Japan.

name: H2 Multiplayer Mod
description:
H2 Multiplayer Mod was a mod for Call of Duty: Modern Warfare Remastered (H1) that aimed to recreate the original Modern Warfare 2 Multiplayer experience with new twists. The mod featured a wide variety of maps, new progression, unique camos, remastered weapons, custom attachments, and more. The original MW2 killstreaks made a return as well, completely changing the way Modern Warfare Remastered feels and plays.

On August 15th, 2024, just one day before the mod was set to release, Activision Publishing, Inc. sent a cease-and-desist letter to the members of the H2M-Mod team, effectively rendering the mod defunct. While the mod team ceased all activity on the project, a playtester leaked a build of the mod, making it available to the public.

name: Secrets of the Dark: Eclipse Mountain
description: Save your friend from the Demon of Darkness in Secrets of the Dark: Eclipse Mountain! Follow clues left by stone monks in a deserted town in Thailand to uncover a thrilling mystery. Battle the dark and magical werecreatures that want to sacrifice your friend in this macabre hidden object puzzle adventure game!

name: Koppotate's Rescue Mission 2: The Path to Eradication
description: Join Koppotate, Ruby and A.J. on a journey to save Koppai from a terrible pandemic. Explore lush environments and brand-new custom story mode maps as you progress towards the eradication of this virus!

description:
A special demo released originally only via codes previous the release of Pokémon Omega Ruby and Alpha Sapphire.
It was the only way to obtain some special items in the full game such as megaevolution stones.

The demo had an original story that differs from the full games' one.

name: Raid Arena
description: Raid Arena is a real-time team-based top-down tactical shooter. The game incorporates new mechanics, fresh concepts & graphics, as well as a focus on community to help provide an entertaining experience for everyone.

name: Lost Resolve
description: A high-speed action platformer featuring advanced movement abilities and momentum.

name: Japaritale
description: Welcome to JAPARITALE, a crossover fan-game between the 2017 anime "Kemono Friends" and the hit RPG "UNDERTALE". One day, a human named KABAN, a long-lost child of the Park, randomly shows up in the Savannah Area. Fallen by a few vines on her path, she realizes the importance of dangers set afoot in this foreign land.

name: Where in the U.S.A. Is Carmen Sandiego?
description: The remake version of Where in the U.S.A. Is Carmen Sandiego? was released in 1996 by Windows and Macintosh and features Lynne Thigpen playing "The Chief" from the World game show. The game's opening credits finds Carmen Sandiego arriving in her underground V.I.L.E. outpost in Washington, D.C., as she and RoboCrook plan to steal America's greatest treasure from each of the 50 states. Carmen later contacts each of her 39 V.I.L.E. operatives telling them to begin their missions.

name: Crayola Paint 'n Play Pony
description:
Create and Care for the Virtual Pony, Horse or Unicorn of Your Dreams! (Ages 5 - 10)
Learn all about horses as you color, decorate, and dress their own horses, ponies, or unicorns!
Tons of Creative Activities: Color with 48 Crayola colors.
Decorate with pretty accessories such as flowers and bows. Dress your pony in over 100 fashions.
Learn fun facts about horses and ponies!

name: MOTAS: Magnum Opus - The Alchemist's Shadow
description:
A rogue-like deckbuilder potion crafting sim, currently in early Alpha.

Build your deck progressively from prima material into tinctures (and stones TBA) to win battles and solve puzzles as you travel through your master’s dungeons and tower. You are a Master alchemists assistant, a homunculus crafted from the bones of a small rodent and shadow alchemy. However, something has gone terribly wrong, and the tower has fallen into disarray. Set things aright with guidance from another homoculus trapped in a flask, battling other homoculi, rival alchemists, and gain esoteric knowledge of your craft through sigils along the way.

name: Mighty Math: Calculating Crew
description: An edutainment game involving four superheroes and four games, each involving math.

name: Feed the Cat
description: When the girl she's dating needs an emergency cat sitter, Claire jumps to volunteer. After all, what could go wrong with pet sitting an adorable little cat for one night? (A short horror visual novel.)

name: The Shiny Show
description:
Look at the pictures & answer as many questions as you can!

For every answer you get right, give yourself a shiny!

name: The Legend of Dark Witch 4
description: Revealed at Tokyo Game Show 2024, "The Legend of Dark Witch Episode 4: Delivering Feelings is coming soon.

name: Zangus
description: Cancelled sequel to Inter Stellar Fantasy.

name: Freddy Fazbears: Security Replacement
description: a Horror Survival Game Made By KwixAF

name: Toad Tavern
description: Mix drinks, master recipes, and learn about your froggy clientele in this 1920s bartending sim. It's up to you and your mixing skills whether this bar is a major hop or a major flop.

name: King Arthur II: The Role-Playing Wargame + Dead Legions
description: Includes King Arthur II: The Role-Playing Wargame and the Dead Legions DLC

name: Sages of Vandaleria: Rebirth of an Empire
description: Vandaleria. A fallen empire. Since the ruling house was overthrown, it has known only misery and hardship. What it needs is a savior. Embark on an epic RPG adventure, fighting across land and sky, restoring the ancient religion, and retake your birthright! That is, if you are ready to pay the price.

name: Damn Dog
description: Guess what WikiHow article an illustration belongs to

name: Dweebers
description: So what if you've got a Styrofoam face? Hey, it's a dweeb world out there! Dweebers knows that. That's why we've given your hero a steam iron face, grasshopper legs, and little booties that look like Volkswagons. Think that's outrageous? Wait till you meet up with your fish larvae enemies! Come on. What are you waiting for? Be a dweeb!

name: Dastardly & Muttley: Operation - Pigeon Pursuit
description: Sin descripción

name: Cupig's Key Collectathon
description: Cupig's Key Collectathon is a little puzzle game where a pig collects keys to open treasure chests. Levels have increasingly difficult solutions. The game measures speed per level bases, the player should get high scores in time.

name: Untitled RPG from WolfEye Studios
description:
This new project is a first-person action RPG that's set in an alternate America in the 1900s. It comes from WolfEye Studios, whose debut title was 2022's "Weird West."

When speaking on the inspiration of the game, studio co-founder Raphael Colantonio had this to say, "If there is such a thing as a continuum between Fallout and Dishonored, I would say Prey is somewhere in the middle because it's already more RPG than Dishonored, and this new game is somewhere closer to Fallout, as far as the RPG-ness goes." The game will be set near or in the Colorado area and conjure a "steampunk 1900s" aesthetic rather than pull from traditional Western tropes.

name: Clock Out At 2
description: Clock Out at 2 is a roguelite visual novel in which you have to survive inside the corporate machine known as the "workplace". Eat fast food. Drink lots of espressos. Experience microaggressions. Pray they don't fire you.

name: Resident Evil: Survivor Redux
description: "Resident Evil: Survivor Redux" is a mod that introduces the traditional fixed camera from the classic Resident Evils into Resident Evil: Survivor, replacing its first-person camera.

name: Bed Bounce
description: Help Mr. Strings bounce off his bed and collect his hi-tech state-of-the-art gadgets

name: Electric Dreams
description: Help Mr. Strings collect batteries in his techno dreamscape. Search all over but watch out for falling crates. Collect ten batteries before your time runs out to complete each level. Collect Sony goodies for extra points. You cannot move through the silicone chips. Use the arrow keys to control Mr. Strings

name: Spring String

name: Pokémon Royal
description: Return to the Galar region in an adventure that rewrites the story of Pokémon Sword and Shield, with new events that enhance it and new faces to meet. Enjoy a beautiful pixel art style, along with all the quality-of-life improvements from the newer generations and every Pokémon available to date.

You play as a member of the "Atypical Vehicle Disposal Squad" division of the Nitro City police force, tasked with destroying a variety autonomous mechanical drones known as "Companions," which have gone rogue and are wreaking havoc throughout the city.
