name: Rhythm Heaven Re-Megamix
description: Rhythm Heaven Re-Megamix is a full, CTGP-style sequel/refresh of Rhythm Heaven Megamix, featuring custom games, custom remixes, ported games from across the series, completely new games, and more.

name: Shining Stars 4: Another Dimensional Incident
description: Shining Stars 4: Another Dimensional Incident is a light kaizo mod continuing, and ending, the story line of SM64 Shining Stars. Star Whomp and Celestial Bowser team up to cause all kinds of alternate dimensional chaos with the 152nd Star Comet, and we must stop them!

name: Wallace & Gromit DVD Game
description:
Join Wallace & Gromit and the characters from their feature film, in the duo's first ever Interactive DVD Game!

In this fun-packed two-team game, players travel around an animated virtual game board, propelled by the Spin-A-Tron: a Wallace-built contraption that takes the place of traditional dice - never before seen on DVD!

name: LakeLady
description: After his girlfriend died in a flood, the surgeon Salvio, in search of the truth behind his missing daughter, enters the "Ward No. 9" of Hongqiang Hospital, shrouded in the legend of the LakeLady.

name: Shadows And Monsters
description: The minions of Evil have swept across the Shadowlands! Embark on a thrilling journey in this action-adventure platformer that combines intense combat with exploration and engage in dialogue and trade with cheeky NPCs.

name: Undergoes
description: Undergoes is a stylized survival horror game where players navigate a drill ship through procedurally generated mines, gather resources, craft tools, and build bases while fending off dangerous enemies.

name: Copper
description: COPPER brings you to a dystopian, industrial world. With tight third-person shooting controls and demanding 3D Bullet Hell mechanics. Push your reflexes and spacial awareness to the limit as you face a rogue machine in the heart of a long lost cave.

name: Ember Lord
description: "Ember Lord" is an exciting isometric 3D survival game

name: Rock Digger
description: Be a rock-digging rock star! Dig for ressources and alien technologies. Upgrade your body and powers. Explore alien worlds. Find numerous secrets. Reach the core. Become a rock god.

name: Brutalist Golf
description: Post Industrial Horror (Golf)

name: Nadir: Giant Hunter
description:
Nadir: Giant Hunter is a fast paced action game.

At the Zenith, abyssal creatures awakens and try to climb the Rift. With your grapple, you can swing in the Rift and accomplish your mission : eliminate the creatures before they can reach surface. To do so, swing towards them, get close enough, and slash them in a single shot !

name: BK Concentration
description: BK Concentration takes the old game for a new ride. There are multiple levels and each one is more challenging than the last, good luck!

name: BS Torneko no Daibouken
description: Based on teaser footage depicted in a 1990s Satellaview commercial, BS Torneko no Daibouken appears to be a Satellaview update to the original September 1993 Torneko no Daibouken: Fushigi no Dungeon for Super Famicom, the earliest game in the Mystery Dungeon series.

name: The Lion Guard: Protectors of the Pridelands!
description: Go on an adventure with the Lion Guard as they show off their unique abilities and practice to become even better at their job as Lion Guard members!

name: Xiyan
description:
The universe is too big and too old.
The Milky Way is just one of the hundreds of billions of galaxies in the universe, the sun is just one of the hundreds of billions of stars in the Milky Way, and the earth is just a speck of dust in the solar system.
Can anyone notice the tiny and short-lived lives that are wandering, crying, enduring, struggling, above that dust?
They are us, the last children of the earth...
- Xi, the descendant of the ancient god of the Arctic Ocean,
- Yan, the blue servant of the Old World,
- Xi, the man-made ancient god of the Pacific Ocean,
- Yan, the red servant of the New World.
All that we do, is it to continue to survive, or to end the pain?
Or, just to prove our existence...

name: Hydro High-Rise
description:
The Rise of the Hydro Zombie!
Welcome to Hydro High-Rise, the ultimate test of your platforming skills and reflexes! In this addictive pixel art game, you play as a zombie equipped with a water-powered jetpack, tasked with ascending a perilous tower. With a blend of 2D and 3D side-scrolling action, Hydro High-Rise offers a unique and visually captivating experience.

Prepare for a challenge like no other as you navigate treacherous obstacles and strive to reach new heights. But beware: one misstep and you’ll plummet back down, adding to the thrill and intensity of each climb. Can you master the jetpack, overcome the tower's devious traps, and achieve the ultimate high score?

This game was created as part of PixelJam-2024 with the theme Aqua, and it was developed with the idea to recreate the pixel art style in Unreal Engine 5.

name: Kewlbiverse
description: Kewlbiverse is an open-world monster adventure that fits right in your pocket. In Kewlbiverse, you can tame and work alongside uniquely designed monsters, build your dream home, and adventure with your friends.

name: Communication Game
description: Sin descripción

name: Wall Street
description: A cancelled business simulation game for the 64DD.

name: Teo
description: Sin descripción

name: Suul
description: A cancelled RPG for the 64DD.

name: El Dorado
description:
It is a strategic defense game depicting the adventures of Ace friends in search of the golden castle, El Dorado.
Find the lost golden city of El Dorado through exciting battles with users around the world!

name: The Trials of Goodbye
description: You are the reaper of Death. This is the final person on Earth. You must decide if they go to Heaven, Hell, or Purgatory based on your own actions. You may choose to befriend this person or not. The choice is yours.

name: Tricks of Light in the Forest
description: "Tricks of light in the forest is a choice-based text adventure with light puzzles, a narrative walking simulator through a deep interactive environment, and a hopeful and unsettling post global-warming near-future story."

name: The Good People
description: A narration-focused interactive fiction about conversation and exploration of a haunted landscape

name: Video Poker Rogue
description: A rogue-lite video poker game where your money is your life!

name: Trivia: Knowledge Trainer - The Quiz Game
description: Sin descripción

name: Jeep Climb Mountain
description: Precision and control are crucial as you navigate steep hills and cross unpredictable rivers without getting submerged.

name: Dodge that, Ronald!
description: Ronald just wants to finish his speech, help him out dodging incoming bullets!

name: Pretty Sweet! Healing Guardian
description: Fulfill your dream of becoming a magical girl! In this tiny management sim you will be in charge of the citizens’ well-being in this cozy town. Balance their emotions with candy magic, manage your sugary stock, upgrade your powers, customize your appearance and raise everybody's quality of life!

name: The Player Who Can't Level Up
description: The Player Who Can't Level Up is an action roguelite game based on web novels and webtoons of the same name. You can freely combine various combat styles and numerous growth factors to become stronger. Experience unexpected enhancement effects through various random elements.

name: Venusville
description: Guide pioneering settlers among Venusian clouds in this space colonisation city builder. Grow food, collect energy, mine resources, balance buoyancy and weight to stay afloat in the treacherous Venusian atmosphere, and build a self-sufficient colony while navigating storms and acidic clouds.

name: Wizard's Wrath Legends
description: A fantasy story-based MMO where FPS meets RTS in a massively multiplayer living world. Spells, skills, weapons, crafting and huge bosses!

name: Stack 'Em Up
description: Save the galaxy from wicked monsters by turning their own powers against them in this chaotic wave defense game. Explore faraway planets, on your own or with friends. Experiment with fun abilities and stack them together to form powerful new combinations.

name: Undead At Dawn
description: Undead at Dawn is a twin-stick shoot’em up with a 3D simil-isometric view using Tilt-Shift effect, in which the player has to survive to hordes of thousands of zombies, in order to rescue his friend and prevent a world invasion.

name: Blow Out
description: Blow Out is a "non-violent" arcade game where you can't kill your enemies, you can only blow them back! It's very fun.

name: Hexdo
description: Ever wanted to be a light and purify the world from evil spirits? Well, I hope you already are, but if not, you can play as one! Hexdo is a simple puzzle game. There is no score, no quests, no save games, you can just play through an endless stream of levels while listening to relaxing music.

name: Of Potions and Spells
description: In this game, you play as a newcomer to the Fairy Tail guild. Being a hentai protagonist, you of course wish to build a harem of the girls of the guild. Soon enough, you find a shop with magic potions and items that will do that and more.

name: Attack on Survey Cops
description: Attack on Survey Corps is a visual novel set in a world inspired by the anime/manga Attack on Titan.

name: Escape from Bash Street School!
description:
Join Scotty, Danny, Toots, Sidney, Plug, Freddy, ‘Erbert, Wilfrid and Smiffy on a mission that seems almost impossible; to escape from the most notorious school in the country.

When the Bash Street Kids discover a mysterious old door in the basement of Bash Street School, they just have to explore! But, as they wander deeper and deeper into the maze of tunnels below, they start to think maybe it wasn’t such a good idea.

- Click anywhere on the screen to jump and tap twice to double jump!

- Dodge enemies, avoid spikes, and find the key to help the kids get back to class

- How did you score? Check the report card on the main menu to get your grade!

name: Bananaman: Food Fighter
description:
Peel the power in this week's exciting adventure, where our hero Bananaman takes on all his foes at once! (Well, more like one by one in hand to hand combat.) Will you take control of our potassium-powered hero, to beat back the baddies? OR will you play as one of Beanotown's villains?

Happy Birthday to Bananaman, Beanotown's very own food-based defender. But when the big blue guy's birthday celebrations get going, things rapidly go wrong. It's veritable villainy as Beanotown is under attack from a cake full of baddies.

Rotten to the core, the evil Appleman is here - but can Bananaman take a bite out of crime?

From outer space, King Zorg thinks this is (once again) the perfect time to take over Earth - can Bananaman send them back to space?

Things blow up when Bubblegum Bert pops onto the scene - can Bananaman burst his bubble?

Captain Cream comes to cause chaos - but can Bananaman make him cry over spilt milk?

The Heavy Mob are here for havoc - but can our hero give them the heave-ho?

The Mole might be making a move - but will Bananaman bury his criminal ambitions?

Things spell doom when Doctor Gloom appears with General Blight - but will Bananaman do what he can and try to win the fight?

Finally, namananaB from Gloom's magic mirror makes an appearance - but is he here to help or harm our hectic hero?

Mark the 40th Anniversary of Bananaman with this retro fighting game where YOU can have fun fisticuffs fighting a few of your favourite mischief makers. Meet Eric, the schoolboy who leads an exciting double life. For when Eric eats a banana, an amazing transformation occurs. Eric is Bananaman! From his first appearance in the Nutty comic in 1980, to his time living in Dandyville, the blue and yellow hero is now Beanotown's best (but not their brightest) hope against defeating evil

name: Yumtree
description:
How savvy are your spending habits? Can you tell a great bargain from a pointlessly pricey purchase?

Well, don’t worry if you can’t spot the difference – we've got the perfect game to get you trained to pick up the best bargains (especially if they’re sausage-based!)

Want to know how to perfect your purchasing powers? All you have to do is:

Buy and sell sausages to get enough money to decorate Gnasher’s kennel!

When you are low on money or sausgages, you will be given the chance to end the biding or selling early

Buy cheap and sell high to make a profit! It's a banger.

So, there you go! Just click Tap To Play and you’ll be richer than Jeff Bezos* in no time!

*Only if you count Jeff Bezos’s fortune in sausages that is, which, let's be honest, he probably does...

name: MultiHero
description: MultiHero is a 2D fighter puzzle platformer inspired by super smash bros.

name: The Flames
description:
The old magician went in search of new knowledge. There has been no news from him for a long time. His student goes in search of her teacher. The path lies through distant lands and ancient ruins. The sorceress will have to break through hordes of enemies, solve riddles with the help of clues and find her teacher.

The player is controlled around the world. Destroys mobs, collects loot, demonstrates objects (eg a bomb), opens new locations. Saving occurs at individual points (obelisk). When revived, the player revives everything else.

name: Super Mario Forever
description:
Super Mario Forever, also widely known as 'Super Mario Bros. Frustration', is a 'Kaizo Hack' of Super Mario Bros. made by a Japanese modder. It is notable for being one of the first extremely difficult Super Mario hacks to be created.

This is the game that is played in the popular video "Super Mario Brothers - Frustration" on YouTube.

name: Eternal Bonds
description: Eternal Bonds is a challenging puzzle platformer where you switch between two characters to solve intricate puzzles. Can you and your unlikely duo escape the spaceship, or will you be stuck puzzling forever?

name: The Enigma Cases
description: The Enigma Cases invites you to test your skills as a detective and solve the most complex cases. Join your friends in this immersive and mysterious world. Do you have what it takes to uncover the truth?

name: Gnomes
description: Deploy your gnomes, tend to your garden and prepare your defenses. Every day the map expands further into goblin territory, revealing new threats and resources. Earn gold, invest wisely and carefully combine your upgrades. Survive long enough and face the goblin king. No two runs are the same.

name: Thank You For Your Application
description: Thank you for your application. After 15 rounds of interviews, you do not match our requirements for the position. You are transferred as a Junior Interviewer to review the candidate's resume according to the company's requirements and send appropriate thanks letters.

name: Screech
description: In "Screech," play as Astrix, exploring The Academy's secrets. Use a compass to travel through time, solve puzzles, and uncover the past. Collect gears and shards to activate a machine that captures knowledge in a "Screech." Discover the mysteries in this captivating puzzle platformer.

name: Riddlewood Manor
description: Welcome to Riddlewood Manor, a delightfully spooky point & click horror adventure. On a mission to purify these haunted halls, you will solve puzzles, meet strange characters, and purge malevolent spirits. Uncover the dark history of the Riddlewoods, but first, you’ll have to survive a demonic doll.

name: Streep
description: Streep invites you to a magical paper world where you, as a pen, hold the power to change everything. Draw lines to alter the environment, reveal hidden secrets, and protect against evildoers. Each decision shapes a unique adventure. What kind of world will you create?

name: Refugees: Shelter
description: Players will take on the role of an ordinary citizen living under the shadow of war. With no end in sight and resources becoming scarce, you must venture out daily to find supplies. While scavenging, you must always be on guard against threats from criminals and deserters...

name: Dungeons & Kingdoms
description: A medieval fantasy kingdom builder, management sim and dungeon delver RPG hybrid. Gather resources, hunt wild animals and build infrastructure. Then dive into the dungeons to face the monsters within. Reap the rewards, unlock new resources and advance your tech.

name: Crossed Commands: Collision
description: Crossed Command: Collision is a 2D pixel-art strategy game. You take charge of mighty mechs to defeat formidable foes, gathering new parts to assemble your own mechs and face even tougher enemies.

name: Elementia
description: Elementia is a tower defense game set in a fantasy world where nations with internal conflicts suddenly form an alliance against a common enemy. Players will develop strategies to defend their homelands against this unpredictable foe as they progress through the territories of the nations.

name: Reign of Cats
description: Reign of Cats - Take control of a cat and explore the neighborhood to complete a variety of missions in this casual RPG.

name: Pixel Pixie
description: A Vorpal Knight with twisted ambitions has kidnapped the last Pixies to drain their power! Replace your weak starting party with stronger heroes, find useful items and game-changing relics, and assemble a formidable rescue team in this roguelike auto-battler, a love letter to the 8-bit RPGs of yore.

name: Escape of The Hammer Princess
description: A retro-styled rampage in both 3D and 2D! After years of waiting to be rescued, the Princess has decided to rescue herself. Escape as the princess in exciting retro-styled 3D, and relive the deaths of her would-be rescuers in classic 8-bit 2D! Bash some Skulls, Break Stuff, and Rise as a Legend!

name: Touko in Underland
description:
Touko In Underland is an exploratory horror game with a focus on beautiful and atmospheric environments.

Break the loop in a seemingly endless labyrinth that has trapped Touko with her unhinged stalker.

name: Hallowanderband
description: Hallowanderband is a casual rhythm game focusing on Halloween-themed stories animated in a cartoon style. Join the miracle journey of the Hallow Wanderband!

name: Castleyard
description: Step into the role of a medieval Lord in Castleyard, a captivating castle management game where your strategic decisions shape the fate of your realm. Manage resources, train knights, and navigate the intricate politics of your court to lead your people to prosperity.

name: Infiniwar
description: Infiniwar is a stylized modern military real-time tactics game inspired by classics in the genre. Command your units in epic battles, call in artillery and air strikes. Upgrade your forces with ARPG-inspired progression systems. Conquer a roguelike campaign that is unique on each playthrough.

name: Ironsand
description: Ironsand is a hardcore rogue-lite FPS. Your team lands on a desert planet full of various enemies. You are given 10 attempts to capture each of the cities and destroy desert monsters, cyborgs and the main goal - the huge Titan combat robots

name: Rogue Climber
description: You've only got a short time to climb. An army of enemies and traps are waiting to stop you. Manage your equipment, hone your build, and master your platforming techniques to climb higher than anyone before you.You think you've got what it takes? I don't think so.

name: Space Game
description: In a vast universe where nothing is familiar, you must use your knowledge to progress and learn how to survive. Upgrade your spaceship and explore to your heart's content, or destroy everything that comes your way, all in classic retro style.

name: Demon Lord: Clicker
description: A Steam-Drop Clicker with real game mechanics in a high fantasy setting. Click for drops, then choose to combine them for stronger/rarer variants, equip them for power! Amass wealth and glory! Be the hero, assault the Demon Lord! (No fruit is harmed during gameplay)

name: Hope
description: HOPE is a cooperative horror game for 1-4 players set in the 1930s. Perform exorcisms, explore dark locations, and use voice commands to survive demons in terrifying scenarios.

name: DevilConnection
description: Punish the little bastard demon and being punished too! Cemo-Summoning Adventure Game

name: DeathGearX
description: A thrilling online PVP battle game! Experience the Ultimate Mech and Tank Battles! Create unique mechs, tanks, and armed jeeps, and master diverse weapons with distinct advantages.

name: Senseless
description: Cursed to lose your mind during a planetary exploration, You only have your wits to help you through the perils of you own psyche. Playing as Jorvin the rat, with mechanics similar to "Prince of Persia", defeat your demons and find peace with yourself.

name: Roads Construction Sim
description: Prepare to master the art of road construction in this highly immersive and realistic simulation game.

name: Peacequarium
description: An idle aquarium simulator you can resize and keep anywhere on your screen while you do other things. Buy, feed, and grow your fish to earn money. Buy cool upgrades and complete your collection of rare, epic and legendary fish!

name: Super Puzzle Blasters
description: With over 45 unique puzzle levels to solve in adventure mode plus local multiplayer for up to 4 people acrross 2 modes and 10 arenas there is a lot to discover in this seamingly pocket sized puzzle game!

name: SVG-001 Puzzle
description: Classic jigsaw puzzle with beautiful visuals, waiting for you to piece it together.

name: Puzzle Masters
description: In our jigsaw puzzle game, the image is shuffled into fragments. Players observe each fragment's shape and color, placing them correctly. The game offers multiple difficulty levels for various skill levels.

name: Albert's Ark Idle
description: Albert’s Ark is a 2D clicker/idle game where you upgrade buildings, play mini-games, make money, sail the seven seas, and revive fantastic mythical creatures to bring magic to the kingdom.

name: Alaric
description: Boomershooter meets Metroidvania. Fight like hell and defeat the evil king. Explore a giant castle full of secrets.

name: Akaneiro ni Somaru Saka
description: Nagase Junichi's life takes an unexpected turn when his fiancée, Katagiri Yuuhi transfers to his school but what would be a happy reunion crumbles due to a misunderstanding. Will this be an end to Junichi's formally peaceful, school life?

name: A Horror Game for Cowards
description: It's a short horror game designed for those who are too scared to play horror games and for horror lovers looking for different experiences. The game features cartoon-style graphics, a narrator and popular horror elements in a safe experience. It also includes Easter eggs and 2 different endings.

name: Airflow
description: Coordinate max flow rate while maintaining separation between aircraft in this air traffic control simulator.

name: AI Schoolgirls Murder Mystery
description: Investigate a teacher's mysterious death in a rural high school by questioning AI-driven suspects, Sora and Miyagi. Gather clues, analyze alibis, and solve the case before the official investigators arrive. Can you find the real killer?

name: A Furry Tale: A night in Havena
description: A Furry Tale - A night in Havena is an action-adventure set in the medieval fantasy world of Aventuria in which you lead two feline protagonists Karanor the warrior and Mewrio the rogue throughout an adventure-packed night in the dark underbelly of the harbor city Havena.

name: Age of Enchantment
description: Age of Enchantment is a tower defense deck-builder set in a classical Fantasy world. Build, upgrade, and enchant your towers with a variety of buffs while adding cards to your deck. Do you have what it takes to thwart the rising Evil?

name: ACP: Action Coin Pusher
description: An Action-Roguelite where you fire coins at evil statues that hurt you if they fall off the bottom of the board. Complete Challenges, unlock classes, perks, and equipment for your runs. Earn Gems in runs to buy permanent upgrades and unlocks. Can you survive 'til the end?

name: Access: EnTree
description: A social-sim RPG where players develop a small town to make it more accessible and inclusive for residents with disabilities. With elements of community building, strategy, and interactive storytelling, players learn to make decisions that affect the game world and its inhabitants!

name: Academy Love Saga: Tennis Angels EX
description: Become the coach of a prestigious sports academy's tennis club, filled with stunning girls who all dislike you. How will you handle it? Win them over, of course! Prepare for intense tennis matches with dynamic gameplay and powerful abilities. Prove your skills and earn their bodies.

name: Academy Love Saga: Tennis Angels
description: Become a coach for the tennis club in a prestigious sports academy with all members being hot chicks, but they all hate you. What to do now? Conquer them all, of course!!! Prepare yourself for heated tennis matches with dynamic gameplay and powerful abilities. Prove your skills and win their hearts.

name: ABYA: Paint Ball
description: ABYA: Paint Ball is a challenging 2D platform action-shooter game. The robot ABYA awakens from a dormant pod, following the guidance of AI, wielding a specialized water gun to explore the complex and hazardous underworld for resources, enhance equipment, and open the central elevator.

name: Abyss Looters
description: Abyss Looters is a cooperative extraction dungeon crawler game, for 1-4 players. Explore Abyss dungeons with friends, avoid traps and dangerous monsters, collect artifacts, build your own adventure guild!

name: Abysmal Gateway
description: Abysmal Gateway is an Open World Dark Fantasy action-RPG with fast-paced combat. Venture into the depths and the forsaken realms of the abyss. Will you emerge victorious, or be consumed by the darkness? This journey is not for the faint of heart!

name: A Bumpy Ride
description: Take a jaunt into the world of A Bumpy Ride, a casual train-driving and exploration game! Inspired by railroading of the 19th century with a whimsical spin, you'll adventure around the open frontier in your trusty little train, picking up passengers and freight.

name: Abrasion
description: Abrasion is a short exploration-focused horror game set inside an ancient megastructure.
